dailyWisdom.shloka: योगस्थः कुरु कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा धनञ्जय। सिद्ध्यसिद्ध्योः समो भूत्वा समत्वं योग उच्यते॥
dailyWisdom.transliteration: Yogasthah kuru karmani sangam tyaktva dhananjaya, Siddhy-asiddhyoh samo bhutva samatvam yoga uchyate
dailyWisdom.meaning: Be steadfast in yoga, O Arjuna. Perform your duty and abandon all attachment to success or failure. Such evenness of mind is called yoga.
dailyWisdom.guidance: Balance is the key to inner peace. When you stop labeling experiences as 'good' or 'bad', you free yourself from emotional turbulence. Practice accepting situations as they are while still taking meaningful action.

dailyWisdom.transliteration: Duhkheshv anudvigna-manah sukheshu vigata-sprhah, Vita-raga-bhaya-krodhah sthita-dhir munir uchyate
dailyWisdom.meaning: One who is not disturbed in mind even amidst the threefold miseries or elated when there is happiness, and who is free from attachment, fear and anger, is called a sage of steady mind.
dailyWisdom.guidance: Emotional steadiness doesn't mean suppressing feelings—it means not being controlled by them. Acknowledge your emotions, but don't let them dictate your actions. This is true maturity.
